original_text: And the men of Kiriath-jearim came and took up the ark of the Lord and brought it to the house of Abinadab on the hill. And they consecrated his son Eleazar to have charge of the ark of the Lord.
korean_text: 기럇여아림 사람들이 와서 여호와의 궤를 옮겨 산에 사는 아비나답의 집에 들여놓고 그의 아들 엘리아살을 거룩하게 구별하여 여호와의 궤를 지키게 하였더니

sentences.original_text: And the men of Kiriath-jearim came
and took up the ark of the Lord
and brought it to the house of Abinadab on the hill.
And they consecrated his son Eleazar
to have charge of the ark of the Lord.
